issue.title: Allow setting Stripe API Version on global configuration.
issue.body:
r? @pakrym-stripe 

## Summary

Allows configuring `Stripe.stripeVersion` on a global-basis to specify beta headers.

For per-requests, `setStripeVersionOverride` can be used.

This also tweaks webhook version checking to ignore beta headers.

## Note 

I tried to stick to the nomenclature used within stripe-java + pre-existing methods rather than making breaking changes to name this apiVersion across the board. WDYT?

comment.body:
**Note**: The magic comments `ptal` and `re-r` are no longer supported.
Please use `r? @...` in the future to request a review from a specific team or individual. See https://go/magic-pr-comments for more info.
To assign back to the author without approving, [ request changes using the Github UI](https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests/collaborating-with-pull-requests/reviewing-changes-in-pull-requests/reviewing-proposed-changes-in-a-pull-request#submitting-your-review).

issue.title: Add feature to track connection success rate
issue.body:
This PR shouldn't cause any change to the way smokescreen operates in any currently-existing configuration. 

It does, however, give users the option to pass their own custom ConnTracker in the smokescreen config, which may include an optional ConnSuccessRateTracker. The latter is a new struct that tracks and periodically the success rate of connection attempts, over a sliding time window of configurable length. If connections to the same host have been attempted more than once in the window, only the most recent attempt is counted (to avoid a single destination host from having an outsized impact.

comment.body:

.

issue.title: API Updates
issue.body:
Codegen for openapi v178.
r? @kamil-stripe
cc @stripe/api-libraries

## Changelog
* Add support for `payment_method_collection` on `Checkout.Session`, `CheckoutSessionCreateParams`, `PaymentLinkCreateParams`, `PaymentLinkUpdateParams`, and `PaymentLink`
